body:
I know that not a lot of you like me but I guess that's just life anyway I'm leaving minecraft for good and I'd like to say thx to a couple of people!

NathCoach: Without you my team would never had started so I'd Like to say I really appreciate the help you gave me and thx heaps

Acceqted: Even though we had our fights I felt you were a great team mate and even though I didn't want to hear some negative things about my team, U told me what I needed to hear so thx!

7hr133n and ur many alts: when times hit hard on the Assassins team u said "I don't care how stupid it seems, I'm staying with the Assassins till they die!" So for being heapful loyal and a good mate, Thank you!

DaFrozenBlaze: I never became good friends with you or anything but your easily one of the nicest people on Avicus and I believe would make an excellent mod!

To my whole team who was loyal: Thanks without you guys I obviously wouldn't have had a team! So cheers!

To Everyone who was mean to me in the mega scrim: I don't know why you didn't like me but I think what you did was not called for and made me feel terrible!

Sorry if you guys don't understand my grammar I am an Australian so yeah! Anyway thanks for a good run and I know a lot of you don't even care that I'm leaving but I'd like to say thx to the avicus community!

title: Bye Guys it's been fun!!!

replies.body: Awww cya :( never got to know ya.
replies.body_tagged: Awww cya :( never got to know ya.

replies.body: Bai Master, thanks for the great run :,(
replies.body_tagged: Bai Master, thanks for the great run :,(

replies.body: Sad to see you go m8, good luck in everything you do in the future
replies.body_tagged: Sad to see you go m8, good luck in everything you do in the future

replies.body:
Ouch. You were always there for me.  Through the pain, breakups, and tears...You never left my side and I never thought of leaving yours..
I can't imagine life without you XmasterSlayer, you've been my best friend since day one, back when we were babies in a cradle.  I'm gonna miss you so so so so so much, but nothing cam destroy our friendship.
We still have skype, FaceTime, and modern technology.  Our friendship doesn't die here..it's just a new chapter in our lives.  I love you to death bro and you will always be in my heart.
Avicus is going to miss you so much, bro.  You've done so much for the server and have helped me grow as a person.  Honestly, I lover you to death and I was immediately in tears as I read your post.  
You're my rock bro.  The sky is the limit and be yourself.  Goor luck and remember...This is not goodbye, but just a new chapter in our lives.

We still have skype, FaceTime, and modern technology.  Our friendship doesn't die here..it's just a new chapter in our lives.  I love you to death bro and you will always be in my heart.
Avicus is going to miss you so much, bro.  You've done so much for the server and have helped me grow as a person.  Honestly, I lover you to death and I was immediately in tears as I read your post.  
You're my rock bro.  The sky is the limit and be yourself.  Goor luck and remember...This is not goodbye, but just a new chapter in our lives.
